observation: [{'url': 'https://www2.livedrive.com/ForHome/photo-backup', 'content': "Livedrive Backup and Livedrive Briefcase are available to purchase as separate products. If you want to enjoy the benefits of both, however, you can purchase them together in our Pro Suite bundle. Is Livedrive available for my device? Livedrive's desktop software works on Windows 7 and above, & Mac OS X 10.11 and above computers."}, {'url': 'https://www2.livedrive.com/ForHome/windows-backup', 'content': 'Think of Livedrive Windows Backup as a live duplicate of your computer files. If you add a new file, or edit an existing one, these changes will be reflected on Livedrive. Additionally, Livedrive keeps up to 30 previous versions of your edited files, so any accidental saves or undesired edits can be reverted.'}, {'url': 'https://www2.livedrive.com/forhome', 'content': 'Livedrive automatically backs up your photos, documents, music, and videos to our secure UK data centres. Our Windows and Mac software takes less than a minute to set up and starts backing up your files straight away. Backup is like a mirror of your computer files, if you add or edit a file, the same will happen on Livedrive.'}, {'url': 'https://www.tomsguide.com/reviews/livedrive-review', 'content': 'Livedrive also offers two business plans: Business Express and Business Standard.The Express plan costs $50 a month and includes 2TB, with both storage and sync for up to three user accounts. The ...'}, {'url': 'https://www2.livedrive.com/', 'content': "Livedrive accounts are fully compliant with EU privacy laws and use the strongest available transfer encryption to make sure your files get safely to our UK data centres. We support two factor authentication (2FA), helping prevent unauthorised access to accounts, even if a customer's login is known by an unwanted user."}]

thought: The search results indicate that "livedrivfs" is not associated with the website in question. The website https://livederivfs.com/ is a scam website.
